revisions.*: Because "rvslots" was not specified, a legacy format has been used for the output. This format is deprecated, and in the future the new format will always be used.

{{Taxobox | image = | image_width = 235px | image_caption = | regnum = [[Fungi]] | divisio = [[Basidiomycota]] | classis = [[Agaricomycetes]] | ordo = [[Agaricales]] | familia = [[Cortinariaceae]] | genus = ''[[Gymnopilus]]'' | species = '''''G. dilepis''''' | binomial = ''Gymnopilus dilepis'' | binomial_authority = ([[Miles Joseph Berkeley|Berk.]] & [[Christopher Edmund Broome|Broome]]) [[Rolf Singer|Singer]] (1951) | synonyms_ref = | synonyms =''Agaricus dilepis'' Berk. & Broome (1871)
''Flammula dilepis'' (Berk. & Broome) [[Pier Andrea Saccardo|Sacc.]] (1887)
''Naucoria dilepis'' (Berk. & Broome) [[António Xavier Pereira Coutinho|Cout.]] (1925) }} {{mycomorphbox | name = ''Gymnopilus dilepis'' | whichGills = adnexed | whichGills2 = adnate | capShape = convex | hymeniumType=gills | stipeCharacter= | ecologicalType=saprotrophic | sporePrintColor= | howEdible= }} '''''Gymnopilus dilepis''''' is a species of [[mushroom]] in the family [[Cortinariaceae]]. This species is found in India and North America. It was given its current name by mycologist [[Rolf Singer]] in 1951. ==Phylogeny== ''Gymnopilus dilepis'' is in the lepidotus-subearlei infrageneric grouping within the genus ''[[Gymnopilus]]''. ==See also== {{Portal|Fungi}} [[List of Gymnopilus species|List of ''Gymnopilus'' species]] ==References== {{Reflist|refs= {{cite journal |doi=10.2307/3761920 |vauthors=Guzmán-Dávalos L, Mueller G, Cifuentes J, Miller AN, Santerre A |title=Traditional infrageneric classification of ''Gymnopilus'' is not supported by ribosomal DNA sequence data |journal=[[Mycologia]] |volume=95 |issue=6 |year=2003 |pages=1204–14 |url=http://www.mycologia.org/cgi/content/full/95/6/1204 |pmid=21149021}} {{cite journal |author=Singer R. |year=1951 |title=The Agaricales in modern taxonomy |journal=Lilloa |volume=22 |page=560}} {{cite journal |vauthors=Thomas KA, Guzmán-Dávalos L, Manimohan P |year=2003 |title=A new species and new records of ''Gymnopilus'' from India |journal=[[Mycotaxon]] |volume=85 |pages=297–305}} {{cite web |url=http://www.mycobank.org/MycoTaxo.aspx?Link=T&Rec=445575 |title=''Gymnopilus dilepis'' (Berk. & Broome) Singer 1951 |format=International Mycological Association |work=MycoBank |accessdate=2011-01-15}} }} {{Taxonbar|from=Q5231707}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Gymnopilus dilepis}} [[Category:Gymnopilus|dilepis]] [[Category:Fungi of Asia]] [[Category:Fungi of Europe]] [[Category:Fungi of North America]] [[Category:Fungi described in 1871]] [[Category:Taxa named by Miles Joseph Berkeley]] {{cortinariaceae-stub}}
